```{r Go Enirched GO terms,asis=TRUE}
go_enrichmenttables <- list(
  goenrichmentsbp,
  goenrichmentsmf,
  goenrichmentscc
)
for(onttable in go_enrichmenttables){
  DT::datatable(onttable)
}
```



```{r Go Enrichment Cladograms}
for(on in c('BP','CC','MF')){

godistmatrix%>%
  dist('manhattan')%>%
  hclust%>%
  as.dendrogram%>%
  plot( cex = 0.2, horiz=TRUE, main = paste0('\nCLUTO clusters, distance by enriched GO terms :\n ',ont))

}
```
